tool_description: Do you live for the Lotto America? Well, youâ€™ve just found your match! Get the latest winning numbers and statistics for your game!

api_list.name: General Statistics
api_list.description: This endpoint pulls basic statistics of the Lotto America numbers. For each ball (denoted firstNumber, secondNumber, thirdNumber, fourthNumber, fifthNumber, starBall, bonus), this endpoint returns the mean, median, mode, min, max, standard deviation, variance, skewness, and kurtosis. After which, the endpoint returns the number of occurrences of each number over the life of the game.

api_list.name: Drawings Between Dates
api_list.description: Get all Lotto America winning number sets between two specified dates where the first number supplied is the beginning date and the second number supplied is the end date.

required_parameters.name: date1
required_parameters.description: The start date for the range of drawings.

required_parameters.name: date2
required_parameters.description: The end date for the range of drawings.

api_list.name: Drawing By Date
api_list.description: Get the winning Lotto America number set from a specific drawing date.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of the drawing to retrieve.

api_list.name: Random QuickPick for Play
api_list.description: Get a randomized Quick Pick for Lotto America. This is a random set of playable Lotto numbers.

api_list.name: Latest 10 Drawings
api_list.description: Get the latest, and last winning 10 Lotto America number sets.

api_list.name: Latest Drawing
api_list.description: Get the latest, and last winning Lotto America winning number set.

api_list.name: Get All Lotto America Drawings
api_list.description: Get all winning drawings from Lotto America.
